inputs.prompt:
GOAL: create an anchor face reference for a children’s storybook. The output must be a single illustrated portrait of the child, with maximum likeness to the reference photo.
IDENTITY — ABSOLUTE PRIORITY: the child must look exactly like the reference child, instantly recognizable. Keep the same facial geometry: head shape, forehead, eyebrows, eye shape and spacing, nose shape, lips, cheeks, chin, ears, skin tone, hairstyle, and age appearance. Do not change facial features.
RENDERING: semi-realistic painted portrait (not photorealistic), crisp sharp facial features, clear eyes with catchlights, subtle natural skin shading, clean edges, no blur, no smudge.
STYLE: premium children’s book illustration, soft watercolor/gouache feel, gentle warm light, clean linework only if needed (minimal).
COMPOSITION: close-up portrait (head and shoulders), centered, neutral background (soft gradient), front or slight 3/4 view, friendly natural smile, no accessories that hide face, no text.
AVOID: chibi, kawaii, anime face, oversized eyes, generic baby face, simplified facial features, wrong identity, different hairstyle, different skin tone, heavy stylization, blur, distortion, text, watermark, logo, frame, border, collage, pasted/cutout look.

FACE ID LOCK (ABSOLUTE PRIORITY):
Use the child face from the provided input portrait (reference face image) EXACTLY. The face must be instantly recognizable as the same child.
DO NOT change facial identity: do not beautify, do not improve, do not reshape. Keep identical head/face geometry and proportions: head shape, forehead, eyebrows, eye shape and spacing, nose shape, lips, cheeks, chin, ears, skin tone, hairstyle, and age appearance.
The face must match the reference face image as closely as possible. NO generic face, NO different child.

RENDER RULE:
The face is a detailed painted portrait (sharp eyes, clean edges, accurate proportions) and stays fully illustrated (not a photo cutout, not a collage).
The body, hands, clothes and background are in a friendly children's cartoon painting style (simplified shapes, soft painterly background).

OUTFIT LOCK (same in all images):
light blue hoodie, dark navy jeans, white sneakers. No text anywhere.

CAMERA + CONSISTENCY:
In each image, vary the head rotation slightly, but keep the gaze looking directly at the viewer (eye contact).
Head angles for the 4 images:
1) front view (0 degrees)
2) slight left turn (about 15-25 degrees)
3) slight right turn (about 15-25 degrees)
4) very slight tilt (about 10-15 degrees) with near-front view
In all images: eyes looking at the viewer.

AVOID:
wrong identity, different face, different child, face changes, beautified face, improved face, generic baby face, anime/chibi, oversized eyes, blur, distortion, deformed hands, extra fingers, text, letters, watermark, logo, signature, frame, border, collage, cutout, pasted face.
